catentdesc.name: Hermitage Black Turtle Neck Pullover
catentdesc.longdescription: This slim fitting black knitted pullover with three-quarter sleeves exudes warmth and comfort. The stylish cable knit design has a touch of elegance. The ribbed hem grazing the thigh sets off a slender frame.

catentdesc.name: Gusso Short Pink Cardigan
catentdesc.longdescription: A short cardigan in pastel pink, it has pockets at the front to keep your hands warm. Made of thin, lightweight material, the cardigan is soft on the skin and suitable for all seasons. Available in all sizes, this long-sleeved cardigan is a popular choice among women.

catentdesc.name: Borsati Purple Short-Sleeved Sweater
catentdesc.shortdescription: Purple short-sleeved sweater with ruched sleeves
catentdesc.longdescription: This perfect purple curve-hugging sweater with ruched sleeves is suitable for many occasions. The ruching at the sleeves create a buoyant look. Dress it up with a skirt for a formal occasion or pair it with jeans for a casual outing.

catentdesc.name: Luigi Valenti Black Sweater Dress
catentdesc.longdescription: Paired with matching leggings, this high-neck sweater dress makes an interesting ensemble. Stylishly cut, this short-sleeved outfit accentuates your curves in the best possible way. Worn with a belt, this sweater can be the little black dress in your wardrobe.

catentdesc.name: Albini Gray Turtle Neck Pullover
catentdesc.longdescription: Spun in an intricate diamond-shaped pattern, this gray hip-length sweater is modern designer couture. Not only does this sweater keep you warm in style, but also lends a fashionable expression to your clothing. The half sleeves and the turtle neck make it ideal for layering under a winter jacket.

catentdesc.name: Versatil Turtle Neck Pullover
catentdesc.shortdescription: Classic black turtle neck pullover with three-quarter sleeve
catentdesc.longdescription: This turtle neck in classic black is soft with ribbing on the sleeves and around the neck. This sweater is part of a time-honored tradition and continues to be a fad among women till date. Presenting a neat look, it will be a great layering essential for winter.

catentdesc.name: Hermitage White Sweater Dress
catentdesc.longdescription: This off-the-shoulder thigh-length dress in pristine white has full-length sleeves. Spruce up your wardrobe with this attire for a snazzy and curvaceous appearance. You can match it with a pair of jeans or patterned leggings for different looks.

catentdesc.name: Gusso Off-White Designer Top
catentdesc.longdescription: This light-as-air white top has a deep scoop necked design. Knitted in two unique patterns converging at the waist and sleeve ends, this full-sleeved top indicates a taller and leaner form. It is elegant and is a year-round choice.

catentdesc.name: Borsati Black Woollen Sweater Top
catentdesc.longdescription: Short and black, this woollen sweater top can be worn over any top, tee or dress to make a fashion statement. Fastened with rounded black buttons and of thin wool blend, this top keeps you pleasant and comfortable on nippy fall days. The long tightfitting sleeves have a slimming effect.

catentdesc.name: Luigi Valenti Multi-Striped Sweater Dress
catentdesc.longdescription: This attractive and youthful sweater dress reflects the colors of the fall season. The colorblocked stripes in earthy tones portray an urbane and sophisticated appearance. With long sleeves and a turtle neck, this dress is formfitting and emphasizes the curves.

catentdesc.name: Albini Off-The-Shoulders Sweater
catentdesc.longdescription: A long sweater worn over one shoulder, it has subtle stripes providing a designer look. The loose comfortable fit and the three-quarter sleeve keep it fancy yet casual. Due to the relaxed shape and flexibility, this slipover can be used as a cover-up for the beach.

catentdesc.name: Versatil Sweater with Colorblocked Stripes
catentdesc.shortdescription: Full-sleeved and turtle necked sweater with colorblocked stripes
catentdesc.longdescription: Turtle necked with bold colorblocked stripes, this sweater adds a teen touch to your wardrobe. Formfitting and stylish, it makes you feel young and great anywhere. For a formal occasion, pair it with a black formal skirt or trousers. For an informal setting, pair it with blue denim jeans.

catentdesc.name: Hermitage White High-Necked Sweater
catentdesc.longdescription: This chic and modern sweater with lacy ruffles around the neck, when paired with a long pair of jeans, make a unique fashion statement. The lacy pattern is repeated on the front and along the long sleeves. Use a belt to further flatter your figure and show off a slender waist.

catentdesc.name: Gusso Classic Black Sweater
catentdesc.longdescription: This classic black sweater with elbow-length sleeves is a go-to choice any day. The low cut v-neckline is super flattering. Pair it with a white shirt to for a bold look in black and white.

catentdesc.name: Borsati White Sweater Top
catentdesc.shortdescription: Short white sweater top with short sleeves
catentdesc.longdescription: This deep v-necked short sweater top made of stretched cotton can be buttoned up for a more formal look. White in color, this sweater can be matched with contrast-colored top or dress for a fancy getup. Team it with a short dress with spagetti straps for a trendy look.

catentdesc.name: Luigi Valenti White Turtle Neck Pullover
catentdesc.longdescription: A simple sweater for any girl 's wardrobe, this turtle neck of cool cotton blend, adds a touch of feminine flair. Soft and light, it has long, fitting sleeves. A timeless classic, this pullover is available in all sizes.

catentdesc.name: Albini Casual Top in Shocking Pink
catentdesc.longdescription: This casual top in shocking pink is appealing to the eye and draws attention to itself. The dolman sleeves with ruching at the edges, render a slim appearance to the shoulders and arms. The bow at the neck enhances the boat neckline.
